name: Vaosus
description: So what if one day you just appear here, in this strange world, and you are determined to get out. But how? Do testing? Stick to the instructions? What is the right way? Are you really what you think you are? Why someone is telling this and something is telling that? What will you choose? What is being hidden from you? So many questions. The only answer waits for you. But you'll have to find it yourself. Beware of the limitations. Why is everything so minimal? You can handle way more advanced things, but yet, this thing is so simple. Let me tell you a secret: it needs to be minimal, because there is a lot of it happening simultaneously. Now go, solve the riddle...
